item.title: Build a self-hosted, fast, secured and free static site in less than 3 hours
item.description: Unless you’re a developer or you want to learn how to do this, my first advice is to avoid to build your own static site. You can get a similar service bundled with other advantages on Medium what we get at the end No costs. A complete control. A very fast static site. A secured website. A website compliant to best practices. A minimalist design. A beautiful code syntax highlighting of a wide range of languages.
